item.title: Has DDev Plastiks Industries Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: DDev Plastiks Industries Ltd has declared a 50% dividend, amounting to 1.75 per share, with an ex-date of September 15, 2025. The company has shown strong total returns over longer periods, particularly a 238.52% return over three years, despite some negative returns in shorter terms. Time: Feb 12 2026 11:31 PM IST
